overview: Dr. Cuellar leads Agrisomaâ€™s partnering initiatives, ongoing licensing activities, and strategic planning for product development. Previously held positions include Director of Corporate Business Development at Promega Corporation, responsible for technology and corporate acquisitions, alliance management, corporate information resources & competitive intelligence. Most recently, Dr. Cuellar served as Consultant to the Technology Management and International Programs Departments at the Donald Danforth Plant Science Center in St. Louis, Missouri. His career began at Amoco Technology Company, where he led research and development teams in metabolic pathway engineering of plants. Dr. Cuellar received his PhD in Biological Sciences from Stanford University, and was a postdoctoral fellow at The Plant Breeding Institute in Cambridge in the UK and at Purdue University in Indiana.
